summary: This header file provides platform-specific definitions for different versions of SunOS, including Solaris 2.x (SunOS 5.x) and older SunOS 4.0.3/4.1.x. It configures various system features such as shared memory, semaphores, message queues, and handles platform-specific quirks.

logs.reason: Defines the operating system name that may be logged elsewhere in the codebase to identify that the system is running on SunOS/Solaris.
logs.resolution: This is an informational string used for system identification and doesn't require resolution.
